settings.portNumber: The port number of the server
settings.usernameBoss: Username of a single bot that listens to your commands (Accepted are A-Z, 0-9, _)
settings.usernameBuilder: Username of the bots that build the maze (Accepted are A-Z, 0-9, _)
settings.numOfBuilders: Number of bots to build the maze. This number cannot exceed the maximum player count of the server and the height of maze you wish to have built
